arm_group.description: males who live in Dongguan more than 6 months and without residence cards
males who live in Dongguan more than 6 months and with residence cards

brief_summary.textblock:
To determine the prevalence of sexual problems particularly premature ejaculation and
      erectile dysfunction among men working in factories of Dongguan city, using the self-rating
      scales like International Index of Erectile Function, and to investigate the characteristics
      or risk factors associated with these sexual problems in floating population through
      regression analysis.

clinical_study.brief_title: Male Reproductive Health of Floating Population: a Large-Scale Survey in Dongguan

detailed_description.textblock:
In China, the floating population is a special group of people who work and live outside
      their hometowns and without residence cards of that area they reside. Sexual problems are
      common in floating population, majority of whom are in their sex active age. There is a lack
      of studies concerning these sexual problems, so we conduct this survey to investigate the
      sexual dysfunctions among men, especially the floating population, and to find out whether
      most of these sexual problems are related to their social lives, medical illnesses, and
      psychological status.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  have reached 18 years old

          -  live in Dongguan more than 6 months

          -  floating population

          -  with or without residence card

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  younger than 18 years old

          -  live in Dongguan less than 6 months

study_pop.textblock: male workers in several towns of Dongguan city

facility.name: Dongguan Taiping People's Hospital Andrology Department

clinical_study.official_title: Prevalence of Reproductive Health Problems and Their Social, Psychological and Physical Association Among Men in Floating Population: a Large-Scale Cross-Sectional Study in Dongguan City

primary_outcome.description: Determine the prevalence of sexual problems among men of floating population in Dongguan.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: First Affiliated Hospital, Sun Yat-Sen University

secondary_outcome.description: Association between social, psychological and physical factors and sexual problems.
secondary_outcome.measure: Association between risk factors and sexual problems

clinical_study.source: First Affiliated Hospital, Sun Yat-Sen University

lead_sponsor.agency: First Affiliated Hospital, Sun Yat-Sen University

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Cross-Sectional
